andromeda.why: Quiet, inner orientation toward true direction—personal sovereignty practice, but not liberation/rescue action (Andromeda).

arcturus.why: Self-placement calibration: waiting for felt-right positioning before motion echoes Arcturan ‘right spot, right time’ basics.

draco.why: No dominance, rank enforcement, or predator vigilance here.

lyra.why: This isn’t creative display or aesthetic enchantment.

orion-dark.why: No obedience machinery or hierarchical coercion in play.

orion-light.why: Subtle ‘hold the line until it’s clear’ micro-ordeal quality—patience under uncertainty.

pleiades.why: Sensitivity to timing/safety before moving; gentle attunement to inner needs.

sirius.why: Personal navigation without transmission/teaching; no liberation-by-instruction vector yet.

andromeda.why: Protecting one’s energy from being used ≠ collective anti-domination work.

arcturus.why: Natural navigator for people/resources—quietly placing things where they function best is classic Arcturan triage/placement.

draco.why: Projection pressure can invite status policing or ‘prove your value’ dynamics (Draco distortion).

orion-dark.why: Risk of yielding direction to external authority when over-projected on.

orion-light.why: Not an initiatory trial frame; it’s practical placement.

pleiades.why: Quiet attunement to others’ needs informs where/when to place them.

sirius.why: Guidance is practical, not sacred-instruction or liberation teaching here.

andromeda.why: Self-worth around purpose under trial ≠ anti-capture intervention.

arcturus.why: Messy course-correction is still placement work—learning how/where to orient through feedback.

draco.why: Judgment/status games from others can provoke defensive posturing.

orion-dark.why: Temptation to conform to external maps/authority for approval.

orion-light.why: Trial-and-error navigation is a micro-ordeal that forges true direction.

pleiades.why: Sensitivity to being judged/unseen colors the learning loop.

sirius.why: No explicit sacred-law transmission; this is self-forging of direction.

andromeda.why: Refining a path via lived experience ≠ freeing others from unjust control.

arcturus.why: Linking people/places so the network runs cleanly—system engineering/container design is peak Arcturus.

draco.why: Successful placement can attract clique enforcement or gatekeeping.

orion-dark.why: Risk of ossifying the map into rigid hierarchy if over-identified.

orion-light.why: Teaching others to orient by example carries a light initiatory flavor.

pleiades.why: Relational attunement informs who fits where for stability.

sirius.why: Implicit instruction: others learn right placement from your wayfinding (pedagogy-by-placement).

andromeda.why: Waiting for rescue/authority to define the path (surrendered sovereignty) is Andromeda shadow.

arcturus.why: Healer/guide projection and scapegoat load when ‘fix it now’ expectations aren’t met.

draco.why: Blame/gatekeeping dynamics and rank-based policing can entangle this line.

orion-dark.why: Outsourcing direction to authority/hierarchy; compliance to the ‘savior’ structure.

orion-light.why: When claimed cleanly, standing apart from projections is a quiet ordeal of integrity.

pleiades.why: People-pleasing or fear of abandonment can warp direction-taking.

sirius.why: Group looks for a fixer; this is strategy/projection, not sacred-law transmission.

andromeda.why: Orientation leadership by presence isn’t the same as anti-exploitation intervention.

arcturus.why: Holds stable, long-range direction so systems organize around it—Arcturan apex of container/compass (with a known risk of clinical aloofness).

draco.why: Authority aura can slip into status gatekeeping if unexamined.

orion-dark.why: Legacy direction can ossify into rigid doctrine/hierarchy if over-fixed.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-example: others ‘pass’ the quiet ordeal of aligning to truth.

pleiades.why: Focus is compass integrity, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Wayfinding mentor—transmits higher order via lived direction (pedagogy-by-presence).
